text:
The Flaming Sands is a massive [[Fernia]]n [[wild zone]] located in the center of [[Andnemun Desert]], on the border between [[Sunyagir]], [[Syrkarn]] and [[Borunan]], [[Riedra]]. True to their name, the Flaming Sands are marked by the near-constant fire storms that tear through the desert. The region's flaring lights can be seen from a great distance even when the sun is high in the sky. When the [[plane]] of [[Fernia]] is coterminous, the temperature of these storms can rise so high that they melt the sands, leaving trails of sparkling glass in their wake.

The Flaming Sands region has the [[Burning Bright]] [[universal property]] of [[Fernia]].
title: Flaming Sands
tags: [[manifest zone]] desert Syrkarn Riedra Sarlona Sunyagir Borunan
tooltip: massive Fernian wild zone in the Andnemun Desert between Syrkarn and Riedra
